segment.source: Troubleshooting Configuration of Driver Deployment, Testing and Debugging
segment.target: Troubleshooting Configuration of Driver Deployment, Testing and Debugging

segment.source: Provisioning a target computer is described in Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).
segment.target: Provisioning a target computer is described in Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).

segment.source: Here we give some troubleshooting tips for the provisioning process.
segment.target: Here we give some troubleshooting tips for the provisioning process.

segment.source: General tips
segment.target: General tips

segment.source: Configure Computers menu command is inactive
segment.target: Configure Computers menu command is inactive

segment.source: Provisioning fails
segment.target: Provisioning fails

segment.source: Provisioning fails
segment.target: Provisioning fails

segment.source: The network path was not found
segment.target: The network path was not found

segment.source: The network name cannot be found
segment.target: The network name cannot be found

segment.source: Could not access remote machine
segment.target: Could not access remote machine

segment.source: Debugger won't connect or break in
segment.target: Debugger won't connect or break in

segment.source: Debugger network connection
segment.target: Debugger network connection

segment.source: Debugger 1394 connection
segment.target: Debugger 1394 connection

segment.source: Debugger serial connection
segment.target: Debugger serial connection

segment.source: Configure Computers menu command is inactive
segment.target: Configure Computers menu command is inactive

segment.source: When you first start Microsoft Visual Studio, the Test Configure Computers command on the Driver menu might be inactive (greyed out).
segment.target: When you first start Microsoft Visual Studio, the Test Configure Computers command on the Driver menu might be inactive (greyed out).

segment.source: If you wait about 20 seconds, and then click the Driver menu again, the Test Configure Computers command will be available.
segment.target: If you wait about 20 seconds, and then click the Driver menu again, the Test Configure Computers command will be available.

segment.source: Provisioning fails: General tips
segment.target: Provisioning fails: General tips

segment.source: If provisioning fails, read the sequence of messages in the Computer Configuration window.
segment.target: If provisioning fails, read the sequence of messages in the Computer Configuration window.

segment.source: Typically, this window also displays the location of the configuration log.
segment.target: Typically, this window also displays the location of the configuration log.

segment.source: View the log and make a note of its location so you can refer to it later.
segment.target: View the log and make a note of its location so you can refer to it later.

segment.source: The path to the log might contain a hidden folder.
segment.target: The path to the log might contain a hidden folder.

segment.source: For example, in the following path, AppData is a hidden folder.
segment.target: For example, in the following path, AppData is a hidden folder.

segment.source: C:\\Users\\currentUser\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\DriverTest\\Install
segment.target: C:\\Users\\currentUser\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\DriverTest\\Install

segment.source: The log file will have a name similar to this:
segment.target: The log file will have a name similar to this:

segment.source: Driver Test Computer Configuration 20121115130459167.log
segment.target: Driver Test Computer Configuration 20121115130459167.log

segment.source: Provisioning fails: The network path was not found
segment.target: Provisioning fails: The network path was not found

segment.source: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says The network path was not found.
segment.target: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says The network path was not found.

segment.source: On the target computer, make sure that you have turned on Network Discovery and that you have turned on File and Printer Sharing for the appropriate network profile.
segment.target: On the target computer, make sure that you have turned on Network Discovery and that you have turned on File and Printer Sharing for the appropriate network profile.

segment.source: For example, if the host and target computers are joined to a network domain, you must turn on network discovery and file and printer sharing for the Domain network profile.
segment.target: For example, if the host and target computers are joined to a network domain, you must turn on network discovery and file and printer sharing for the Domain network profile.

segment.source: For more information, see Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).
segment.target: For more information, see Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).

segment.source: Make sure you can ping the target computer from the host computer.
segment.target: Make sure you can ping the target computer from the host computer.

segment.source: On the host computer, open a Command Prompt window, and enter ping targetComputerName, where targetComputerName is the name of the target computer.
segment.target: On the host computer, open a Command Prompt window, and enter ping targetComputerName, where targetComputerName is the name of the target computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You might see several messages before you see the message The network path was not found.
segment.target: You might see several messages before you see the message The network path was not found.

segment.source: Some of those messages might make you think that the network path was found and the first steps of provisioning were succeeding.
segment.target: Some of those messages might make you think that the network path was found and the first steps of provisioning were succeeding.

segment.source: In fact, the network path was not found and no portion of provisioning succeeded.
segment.target: In fact, the network path was not found and no portion of provisioning succeeded.

segment.source: For example, you might see this:
segment.target: For example, you might see this:

segment.source: Provisioning fails: The network name cannot be found
segment.target: Provisioning fails: The network name cannot be found

segment.source: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says The network name cannot be found.
segment.target: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says The network name cannot be found.

segment.source: Double check the name of the target computer.
segment.target: Double check the name of the target computer.

segment.source: If the computer name you entered originally was incorrect, start the provisioning wizard again (Driver Test Configure Computers).
segment.target: If the computer name you entered originally was incorrect, start the provisioning wizard again (Driver Test Configure Computers).

segment.source: Select the incorrect computer name, and click Next.
segment.target: Select the incorrect computer name, and click Next.

segment.source: For Computer name, enter the correct name of the target computer, and complete the wizard.
segment.target: For Computer name, enter the correct name of the target computer, and complete the wizard.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You might see several messages before you see the message The network name cannot be found.
segment.target: You might see several messages before you see the message The network name cannot be found.

segment.source: Some of those messages might make you think that the computer name was found and the first steps of provisioning were succeeding.
segment.target: Some of those messages might make you think that the computer name was found and the first steps of provisioning were succeeding.

segment.source: In fact, the computer name was not found, and no portion of provisioning succeeded.
segment.target: In fact, the computer name was not found, and no portion of provisioning succeeded.

segment.source: For example, you might see this:
segment.target: For example, you might see this:

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The messages that are displayed when you enter an incorrect target computer name can vary.
segment.target: The messages that are displayed when you enter an incorrect target computer name can vary.

segment.source: For example, you might see a message about enabling network discovery.
segment.target: For example, you might see a message about enabling network discovery.

segment.source: Or you might be prompted to enter credentials.
segment.target: Or you might be prompted to enter credentials.

segment.source: Provisioning fails: Could not access remote machine
segment.target: Provisioning fails: Could not access remote machine

segment.source: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says Could not access the remote machine "computerName" over the network.
segment.target: When you start to provision a target computer, you might see a message that says Could not access the remote machine "computerName" over the network.

segment.source: This message can be displayed for several reasons.
segment.target: This message can be displayed for several reasons.

segment.source: Verify that your host and target computers are both joined to the same domain or the same workgroup.
segment.target: Verify that your host and target computers are both joined to the same domain or the same workgroup.

segment.source: For more information, see Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).
segment.target: For more information, see Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1).

segment.source: Verify that you entered the correct name for the target computer.
segment.target: Verify that you entered the correct name for the target computer.

segment.source: Verify that you have enabled network discovery and file and print sharing on the target computer.
segment.target: Verify that you have enabled network discovery and file and print sharing on the target computer.

segment.source: Debugger breakpoints are not triggered for kernel-mode driver
segment.target: Debugger breakpoints are not triggered for kernel-mode driver

segment.source: Deploy the driver with breakpoints disabled.
segment.target: Deploy the driver with breakpoints disabled.

segment.source: Manually break into the kernel-mode debugger.
segment.target: Manually break into the kernel-mode debugger.

segment.source: Set an exception on load of the module:
segment.target: Set an exception on load of the module:

segment.source: Enable the breakpoint and resume execution.
segment.target: Enable the breakpoint and resume execution.

segment.source: On the target computer, disable the device node and then re-enable it.
segment.target: On the target computer, disable the device node and then re-enable it.

segment.source: Debugger won't connect or break in: Network connection
segment.target: Debugger won't connect or break in: Network connection

segment.source: Verify that your debugging application is allowed through the firewall for all network types.
segment.target: Verify that your debugging application is allowed through the firewall for all network types.

segment.source: Check with network administrator about ports that allow network debugging.
segment.target: Check with network administrator about ports that allow network debugging.

segment.source: If the target computer has more than one network adapter, you must specify the bus parameters of the network adapter that you intend to use for debugging.
segment.target: If the target computer has more than one network adapter, you must specify the bus parameters of the network adapter that you intend to use for debugging.

segment.source: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a Network Cable
segment.target: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a Network Cable

segment.source: Debugger won't connect or break in: 1394 connection
segment.target: Debugger won't connect or break in: 1394 connection

segment.source: If the target computer has more than one 1394 controller, you must specify the bus parameters of the 1394 controller that you intend to use for debugging.
segment.target: If the target computer has more than one 1394 controller, you must specify the bus parameters of the 1394 controller that you intend to use for debugging.

segment.source: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a 1394 Cable.
segment.target: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a 1394 Cable.

segment.source: Debugger won't connect or break in : Serial connection
segment.target: Debugger won't connect or break in : Serial connection

segment.source: Check the COM port numbers on the host and target computer.
segment.target: Check the COM port numbers on the host and target computer.

segment.source: Verify that you have configured the same baud rate for debugging on both the host and target computers.
segment.target: Verify that you have configured the same baud rate for debugging on both the host and target computers.

segment.source: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a Serial Cable
segment.target: For more information, see Troubleshooting Tips for Debugging over a Serial Cable
